questions.answer: In the oil fields of Canada

questions.answer: A quarter, three dimes, a nickle, two pennies, fingernail clipper, 20 dollar bill, hatchet, tennis shoes, socks, jeans, underwear, belt, t-shirt, windbreaker, digital watch

questions.answer: There was a shower of sparks
